title: Fertility restored in non-human primate model of childhood cancer survivorship

title_detail.value: Fertility restored in non-human primate model of childhood cancer survivorship

summary: In a first, researchers have reported in a non-human primate model that immature testicular tissue can be cryopreserved, and later be used to restore fertility to the same animal.

summary_detail.value: In a first, researchers have reported in a non-human primate model that immature testicular tissue can be cryopreserved, and later be used to restore fertility to the same animal.
